title: Kids - Volume 1
description: 10 playful and casual themes for children and educational games with multiple loops and shorter edits
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Kids - Volume 1" features 10 playful music themes suitable for children and educational projects.

The arrangements include premium tenor ukulele, acoustic guitars, acoustic and electric piano, mellotron, glockenspiel, upright bass, clapping, drum machines and many types of percussions.

Every music theme comes with multiple loops and shorter edits for a total amount of 679Mb of music.


  • Cartoonish Mad Uptempo: Full length (01:29), 3 Short edits, 16 Loops
  • My Friend Has 2 Ukulele: Full length (01:13), 1 Short edit, 8 Loops
  • Little Helper: Full length (01:39), 2 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Dog: Full length (01:36), 3 Short edits, 12 Loops
  • Retro Gaming Player One: Full length (01:12), 2 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Hip Hop Kids: Full length (01:03), 2 Short edits, 14 Loops
  • Snack: Full length (01:17), 3 Short edits, 11 Loops
  • Play Time: Full length (02:00), 3 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Bells Everywhere: Full length (01:04), 2 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • My Little Ukulele Friend: Full length (01:44), 3 Short edits, 10 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Full length tracks
  •  24 Short edits
  •  102 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 136

Number of Audio Cues: 136

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 63:57

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
